title: BON CLAY'S ULTIMATE SACRIFICE FOR LUFFY - One Piece Episode 451 & 452 Reaction
author: Unknown Reactor
description: Reaction video covering episodes 451 and 452, focusing on Bentham's emotional sacrifice at the Gate of Justice to save Luffy and the escaped prisoners.

title: BON CLAY'S SACRIFICE!? - One Piece Episode 450 & 451 REACTION + REVIEW!
author: Unknown Reactor
description: Combined reaction and review of episodes 450 and 451, examining Bon Clay's decision to sacrifice himself and the emotional impact of the scene.

title: Bon Clay's Sacrifice - One Piece REACTION - Episode 451, 452, & 453
author: Unknown Reactor
description: Multi-episode reaction covering the sacrifice of Bon Clay and its aftermath across three consecutive episodes.

title: BON CLAY SAVES EVERYONE! - One Piece Episode 451 and 452 - Rich Reaction
author: Rich
description: Reaction video by content creator Rich covering Bon Clay's heroic action of saving all the escaped prisoners by opening the Gate of Justice.

title: One Piece: Why Do Fans Love Bon Clay So Much?
author: GameRant
description: An article analyzing why Bentham (Bon Clay) became such a beloved character among One Piece fans, with particular focus on his sacrifice in the Impel Down arc.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers about Bon Clay's fate and later appearances

title: Bon Clay is One Piece's Most Lovable Side Character, and Here's Why
author: CBR
description: Analysis piece examining Bon Clay's character development and why his sacrifice scene resonates so strongly with the One Piece fanbase.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains information about Bon Clay's survival and later status

title: The One Piece Podcast - Episode 451: Luffy's Precious Goo
author: The One Piece Podcast
description: Note: This podcast episode 451 discusses manga Chapter 851, not anime episode 451. The numbering is coincidental.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Discusses manga chapters around 851, which is much later in the story

title: One Piece - Episode 451: Come, Final Miracle! Break Through the Gate of Justice!
author: Toei Animation
description: Official streaming source for episode 451 on Crunchyroll, featuring Bentham's sacrifice at the Gate of Justice during the Impel Down escape.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Official episode stream, no additional spoilers
